body:
## What happened

When I click the "New Flutter Project" to open a project, there is no response

## Version information

Android Studio `4.2 Canary 7` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 48.0.3` • Dart plugin `201.7846.93`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null

comment_data.body:
Sorry about that, but it is a known problem. From the M48 release notes:
> Android Studio Canary releases are not currently supported due to API changes in the very latest canary release. This affects both stable and dev channels for the Flutter plugin; while the plugin can be installed into the canary release, it will not function properly.

The problems should be fixed in the latest [dev channel](https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/wiki/Dev-Channel) build, if you want to try that.

title: Click "New Flutter Project", there is no response
